doc.title: Reference

value.content:
In the context of objects, this is an object reference. On MDN, we could be talking about the JavaScript reference itself.

In computing, a reference is a value that indirectly accesses data to retrieve a variable or a record in a computer's memory or other storage device.

value.title: See also
value.content: • Reference (computer science) on Wikipedia
